reviewText: Decent movie

it was better than I thought -- quite well done
I didn't watch it all the way through for a reason I can't actually remember, so that tells me the movie was not gripping in any way:  not memorable.

I rented this film having no previous knowledge of it and just looking at the cover. I expected it to be a low budget film, I was pleasantly surprised by the quality although I had no idea this a was a film from the early 90's. Some of the acting wasn't good but the overall piece kept me interested enough to watch it until the end. Not bad for 2 bucks.
This movie features a poor script and poor acting.  It was totally predictable and I was happy when it was over.

Very good movie,I enjoy African-American movies that are very close to factural events and I would recommend this movie to all my friends and people that actualiy don't understand the hood in African-American culture.

sometimes i judge whether or not i might enjoy the movie by the cover, the title or the synoposis written on the back, oftentimes i am correct and sometimes as i was with this movie i was wrong,  but it was still a pretty good movie
this film is about a group of young people in deep city life doing what ever to whom ever and killing when they feel the time is right
I came in with low expectations for this movie and came away pleasantly surprised.  Very good and consistent storyline. Clark Johnson was, as always, a delight to see.
